summary: The Incentivizing Readiness and Environmental Protection Integration Sales Act of 2025 aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It proposes to exclude from gross income the gain from the sale of qualified real property interests to qualified organizations for purposes related to the Readiness and Environmental Protection Integration (REPI) program. This exclusion applies to sales made under the Department of Defense's REPI program and includes definitions for qualified real property interests, organizations, and REPI purposes, with limitations related to pass-through entities.
